SELECT DISTINCT(ST.TAB_KEY) AS tabKey, ST.TAB_ID AS tabId, ST.TABNAME AS tabName, ST.IMG_URL AS imageUrl, ST.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE AS displaySequence
FROM SMC.SMC_TAB_MASTER ST JOIN SMC_SECURITY_FUNCTION SF ON ST.TAB_ID = SF.TAB_ID JOIN SMC_ROLE_SEC_FUNCTIONS RSF ON RSF.SEC_FUNC_ID = SF.SEC_FUNC_ID WHERE ST.DASHBOARD_TAB = #{dashBoardId} AND RSF.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} AND ST.STATUS= #{status} AND SF.NAME IN ('ORDER_FULFILLMENT_TAB','ORDER_CONFIRMATION_TAB','PRODUCTION_TAB') ORDER BY DISPLAY_SEQUENCE ASC

SELECT SAH.HEADER_NAME AS headerName, SAH.HELP_TEXT AS helpText, SAH.HEADER_ID AS headerId
FROM SMC.SMC_ALERT_HEADER SAH JOIN SMC.SMC_TAB_MASTER ST ON SAH.TAB_ID = ST.TAB_ID
WHERE ST.TAB_KEY = #{value}
ORDER BY SAH.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE ASC

SELECT SA.ALERT_ID AS alertId, SA.ALERT_KEY AS alertKey, SA.ALERT_NAME AS alertName, SA.ACTIONABLE AS actionable, SA.HELP_TEXT AS helpText, ST.TEMPLATE_KEY AS templateKey, SA.COMPLIANCE_TEXT AS complianceText
FROM SMC.SMC_ALERTS SA LEFT JOIN SMC.SMC_SEARCH_TEMPLATES ST ON SA.TEMPLATE_ID = ST.TEMPLATE_ID
WHERE SA.HEADER_ID = #{headerId}
AND SA.VISIBILITY_PENSKE = 1
AND SA.VISIBILITY_VENDOR = 1
ORDER BY SA.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE ASC
